about_the_game:
Fight back against the powerful wizard who has captured your village under his spell.

Battle your way into his ever-shifting towers and tangle with his minions. Drag treasures from the halls to build your strength. And finally, take the fight to the wizard himself to set your village free.

The castle is always similar but never the same, can you find the way and complete your siege of the shifting fortress?


Optimize your hero for close-quarters combat, long-range assaults, or magical dominance. Do you shoot a Bow, or prefer the balance of a Sword and Shield? How about the raw damage of a Great Sword or the brute force of a Warhammer? Mix and match weapons and abilities to create a combat style tailored to you. Experiment with different builds, each offering distinct advantages and tactical options. Choose your style, master your weapons and select abilities that will allow you to dominate your foes.


Master elemental magic to inflict status effects such as freeze, burn, and poison on your enemies. Ice spells slow and eventually freeze them. Once frozen, focus on other threats as they slowly thaw, or shatter them with a physical attack for bonus damage. Use the raw power of Fire to damage and eventually set your enemies ablaze for high damage over time. Poison spells will weaken your adversaries and slowly drain the life out of them. Each element offers unique strategic advantages and effects that you can use to your benefit.


Reveal Synergy Abilities as you raise specific skills to a threshold, which then unlocks a new, combined ability. For instance, enhance your swordplay by reaching proficiency in both Ice Magic and Enhancement Magic, allowing you to imbue your blade with a chilling freeze effect. Alternatively, level up Fire Magic and Block to gain a burning aura ability that damages nearby adversaries. These synergy abilities reward raising skills thoughtfully to unlock powerful new capabilities.


As you ascend the formidable tower, your mission involves rescuing villagers trapped within its walls. Each villager you free adds a valuable ally to your cause.
Unlock a trainer who can enhance your stats, a blacksmith who upgrades your equipment, or an alchemist to upgrade your potions. These freed villagers' skills become essential to your journey, making you a formidable force against tougher adversaries awaiting on higher floors.
Navigate the tower's mysteries, utilize your expanding network of skilled villagers, and break the chains of oppression. Every rescue sharpens your edge in battle and binds the fate of the tower with your own.


There are combat skills like Sword, Greatsword, and Bow. And, magical ones like Transformation and Summoning.
The choice is yours to develop a character that fits your strategy and preferences.
Master the art of melee with the Warhammer or Spear. Alternatively wield the destructive force of Fire Magic, the freezing power of Ice Magic, or keep you and your friends healthy with Life Magic.
Our skill system is not just limited to combat, it also includes practical abilities like Scouting, which enhances your ability to detect enemies and treasures, and Focus, which intensifies your precision. Each skill can be raised when you level up, unlocking new abilities along the way. Perfect your dodge, to gracefully evade enemy attacks, or research Wind Magic to control the flow of battle. Every skill you choose can dramatically influence your journey and combat effectiveness.
Forge your path to greatness, refine your abilities, and become a legend in a land where skill mastery is the gateway to unrivaled power.


Search every corner of each room to find chests and upgrade your equipment. Find magical items that enhance your stats, skills or grant unique abilities. Equip yourself for glory, and let your gear tell the story of your journey as you rise to become the ultimate hero.

8 Player Online Co-op

Stand alone against the dark.. just you.. and seven of your friends! Join forces in our online co-op game, supporting up to 8 players. Or navigate the tower alone, mastering the game at your own pace to overcome the toughest dungeons and defeat the most difficult bosses. The amount of loot and the difficulty of monsters are multiplied as more players join. Whether you're a lone wolf or a team player, you can have the experience that you desire. Prepare to forge your path, conquer enemies, and achieve greatness, however you choose to play.

Dive into adventures, tackle challenges, and enjoy seamless gameplay with friends worldwide. Experience teamwork, strategy, and unforgettable moments as you struggle to ascend the tower. The adventure begins now!

Have a race with the tower key!


*Note: Racing the tower key has no real purpose other than sheer entertainment value, so don't sprain an ankle.

So, What's With That Cool Magical Fountain?


Oh, you mean that fountain of life? That thing is super cool. It not only saves your progress, but it revives your character too. And, it projects itself into the dungeon to create fountain resting and save stations for you. It's like it has a mind of its own. Buy the game and take a sip and see for yourself!

However, when its life-giving properties were discovered that's where all the trouble began. You see... in this story, some people want to live forever but are going about it the wrong way. Take our main villain for example. His dark magic has aged and corrupted his body, so when he heard about the fountain he immediately invaded the village.

The wizard sought to consume the magical village fountain and take its life-giving properties, but the fountain has a magic of its own. With its powerful life magic the fountain has repelled the wizard.

Stunned and angry the wizard has hidden in the castle and begun experiments to break the fountains' protection. His experiments have produced monstrous creatures that roam throughout the halls. He then hid his location by casting a powerful spell of "Shifting". This makes the dungeons change each time they are entered. He has hidden the path to find him and commanded his minions guard his halls.

Fight your way into his ever-shifting towers and battle his minions. Drag treasures from the halls to build your strength. And finally, take the fight to the wizard himself to set your village free.
